entry.task: Write conference reflection highlighting: mousetrap car, egg drop, and element presentation

Write conference reflection highlighting: (Strengths, weaknessed, goals, & progress)
 Read ch 18-20, 2-3 sentences each, and for each, answer: 
1. What evidence of the horror of the feud is presented in Chapter 18? 
2. What are your predictions regarding how the Duke and the Dolphin/Dauphin will influence the lives of Huck and Jim?
